description: A deep navy blue button-down featuring distinctive red-and-white striped lining on the cuffs and inner collar.
A crisp, classic white dress shirt with a chest pocket, tucked into trousers for a timeless, polished look.
A relaxed light blue oxford shirt worn with the collar unbuttoned, paired with dark pants and sunglasses.
A muted olive green button-down shirt worn untucked over black jeans, offering a casual, earthy aesthetic.
